fields.name: Decline Reasons
fields.description: Reasons for declining referrals in community services organizations.

fields.name: client_not_contactable
fields.label: Client not contactable
fields.description: Unable to establish contact with the client after multiple attempts.

fields.name: client_declined_services
fields.label: Client declined services
fields.description: Client has voluntarily declined to receive the offered services.

fields.name: client_moved_out_of_area
fields.label: Client moved out of area
fields.description: Client has relocated outside of the service delivery area.

fields.name: services_not_appropriate
fields.label: Services not appropriate for client needs
fields.description: The available services do not match the client's specific needs or circumstances.

fields.name: client_receiving_similar_services
fields.label: Client already receiving similar services elsewhere
fields.description: Client is currently engaged with another service provider for similar support.

fields.name: client_did_not_attend
fields.label: Client did not attend scheduled appointments
fields.description: Client failed to attend multiple scheduled appointments without notice.

fields.name: safety_concerns_for_staff
fields.label: Safety concerns for staff
fields.description: Health and safety concerns identified that pose risks to staff members.

fields.name: program_at_capacity
fields.label: Program at capacity
fields.description: The program or service has reached maximum capacity and cannot accept new clients.

fields.name: client_ineligible_for_program
fields.label: Client ineligible for program
fields.description: Client does not meet the eligibility criteria for the specific program or service.

fields.name: duplicate_referral
fields.label: Duplicate referral
fields.description: This referral duplicates an existing referral for the same client and services.

fields.name: referrer_withdrew_referral
fields.label: Referrer withdrew referral
fields.description: The referring organization or individual has withdrawn the referral request.

fields.name: other_requires_explanation
fields.label: Other (requires explanation)
fields.description: Decline reason not covered by standard options - additional explanation required.
